name: idx_lastUpdateDateTime
description: PRIMARY - Almost all queries filter by date range first. Descending for recent-first ordering.

name: idx_lastUpdate_run
description: COMPOUND - Most common pattern in queries.txt: date range + run type (RUN2/RUN3/RUN4/MITIGATIONRESULT)

name: idx_run
description: Filter by run type - PARTITION KEY CANDIDATE. Used in nearly every query.

name: idx_casApplicationId
description: CRITICAL - Application ID lookup and existence checks. Appears in most eligible record queries.

name: idx_orderType
description: Order type filtering (New, Add-Line, Upgrade, BYOP) - used in almost all eligible queries

name: idx_common_ban
description: Common BAN lookup - frequently used identifier in queries

name: idx_authenticId_transactionId
description: AuthenticID transaction lookup - used in authenticID queries

name: idx_authenticId_docNumber
description: AuthenticID document number - used for ID verification queries

name: idx_authenticId_actionCodes
description: AuthenticID action codes filtering ($ne 99 patterns)

name: idx_fraudAlert_isFraud
description: Fraud alert flag - used to find applications with panic button pressed

name: idx_transactionType_imei
description: COMPOUND - BYOP transaction filtering with IMEI validation

name: idx_digital_endUserIp
description: Digital channel IP address tracking

name: idx_payment_cardName
description: Credit card name lookup - used for payment fraud detection

name: idx_createdDateTime
description: Case creation date - used in msAvertackCareCase and avertackCase queries

name: idx_case_rules
description: Case rules filtering (212, 230, 78, etc.) - used in case queries

name: idx_case_gfmsReferral
description: GFMS referral string existence checks

name: idx_case_caseNotes
description: Case notes existence check

name: idx_case_mitigationStr
description: Mitigation string for regex pattern matching (40[89] patterns)

name: idx_cir_field
description: CIR account detail field changes (authorizedUserName)

name: idx_cir_ban
description: CIR BAN lookup

name: idx_capm_postedAccount
description: CAPM posted account number

name: idx_capm_zip
description: CAPM ZIP code filtering

name: idx_complex_eligible_run2
description: COMPOUND - Complete RUN2 ELIGIBLE pattern from queries.txt

name: idx_complex_authenticId
description: COMPOUND - AuthenticID eligible pattern

name: idx_complex_care_byop
description: COMPOUND - CARE BYOP pattern with IMEI

name: idx_complex_digital_cas
description: COMPOUND - Digital eligible with IP tracking

name: idx_wirelessBAN
description: Wireless BAN lookup - used in various lookup queries

name: idx_sessionId
description: Session ID tracking

name: idx_channel
description: Channel filtering (OCEDIRECT, RETAIL, CARE)

name: idx_mitigationRule
description: Mitigation rule filtering
